name: multiply_numbers
description: Multiplies multiplicand and multiplier together to get product (multiplicand * multiplier). Use for calculating total GPU memory, parameter storage requirements, or scaling computations.

multiplier.description: the number to multiply against the multiplicand

name: divide_numbers
description: Divides the dividend by the divisor to find the quotient (dividend รท divisor). Use for calculating instances needed, memory per parameter, or capacity ratios.

divisor.description: the number that dividend will be divided by
